top_comments.comment: i'm so glad you guys included kapustin in there. he's one of my favorite composers just from the groove he has

You should do a composer profile series. Like ten prices of prokofiev, bach, debussy and others.
THANK YOU

comments_since_last_sample.body: You missed Tchaikovsky's second mov of his 1st symphony. Such a wonderful, melancholic and peaceful music! omg
I find Britten's final (3rd) SQ very like Bartok's final (6th). Both are deeply sad.
